name: THE BEST DAMN
description:
A remix Method1's Lemonaids which is a remix of SlashaLO's Satyra.

This shit bangs. No subs possible. Best damn ratio of concentrates in the game. Fuck me up, fam.

ATF won't allow me to put the accurate steep day for this one, so please note that this recipe is best at about 5 days BEFORE you mix it. Trust me.
author: matthewkocanda

reviews.text: I attempted to make this and my left tit fell off. Well, I did want to lose weight. ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

K well obviously a joke...though not sure why its funny...just clogs up the pipes.  Thank goodness everyone else isn't immature enough to post stuff like this or no one would use this site let alone pay for it.

I just mixed this up and did a quick S&V and it was pretty good but I think it will be a lot better with a little more steep time. I don't have (TPA) Organic Strawberry, does anybody know what I can sub it with?
Everytine I vape this I taste something different. I haven't had vapor tongue since this mix. Miracle cure!!!

This is an amazing recipe. Absolutely astonishing all day vape. Most recipes tend to be linear, straight forward. Not this. There's no end to the flavors. It's the everlasting gobstopper of the mixing world. One minute it's a strawberry cake, the next minute it's a strawberry cream cake. Very good use of FA Lemon Sicily. This recipe brings a whole new meaning to "being on 100" as well as a new meaning to "all the flavors", fam. Definitely nothing like it and that's a promise. Great job..

This looks like aids on herpes mixed with the clap that kills weeds and causes lemmings to eat their unborn children while having sex on santa clause's tummy tum. Just looking at this turned me blind, so I had to vape Satyra to get my site back so I could use Best damn Lemon Aids as nair to shave my legs. I realized my mistake though, I subbed JF and FW Yellow cake %'s, and I think that made the world of difference. Once I did that, I have seen the light.

What the fuck did you just fucking say about me, you little bitch? I‚Äôll have you know I won the first ever DIYorDIE World Heavyweight Mixing Championship, I‚Äôve been involved in numerous secret raids on Cuttwood, and I have over 300,000 confirmed recipe views. I am trained in diacetyl mixfare and I‚Äôm the top mixer in the entire World Heavyweight Division. You are nothing to me but just another B U D. I will wipe you the fuck out with precision the likes of which has never been seen before on this Earth, mark my fucking words. You think you can get away with saying that shit to me over the All The Flavors? Think again, fucker. As we speak I am contacting my secret network of CONRADVAPES spies across the USA and your IP is being traced right now so you better prepare for the storm, maggot. The storm that wipes out the pathetic little thing you call your life. You‚Äôre fucking dead, B U D. I can be anywhere, anytime, and I can out mix you in over seven hundred ways, and that‚Äôs just with my drug scale. Not only am I extensively trained in eyeballing drops, but I have access to the entire arsenal of the Polish Inawera Corps and I will use it to its full extent to wipe your miserable ass off the face of the All The Flavors, you little shit. If only you could have known what unholy retribution your little ‚Äúclever‚Äù recipe was about to bring down upon you, maybe you would have kept your fucking bag of unorganized flavors closed. But you couldn‚Äôt, you didn‚Äôt, and now you‚Äôre paying the price, you goddamn idiot. I will shit fury all over you and you will drown in TFA Pear. You‚Äôre fucking dead, B U D.
